## Validation.Classes.ObjectValidator class

In-place [Validator](./ts-utils.validation.validator.md) for an object of type `<T>`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ObjectValidator<T, TC = unknown> extends ValidatorBase<T, TC> 
```
**Extends:** ValidatorBase&lt;T, TC&gt;

## Remarks

By default, succeeds if all of the required fields exist and are validate, and fails if any required fields do not exist or are invalid. See [Validation.Classes.ObjectValidatorOptions](./ts-utils.validation.classes.objectvalidatoroptions.md) for other validation options.
